name: Body Desecration
description:
Body Desecration from Adrien Husson on Vimeo.

Body desecration is a game where you have to find the original source sound. You can't use your eyes, only your body by managing your equilibrium on a tray. The more you move apart from your goal, the more the music dives into chaos.

Source code available here : https://github.com/hssnadr/Body_Desecration
